channel.title: HKG:293 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:293 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cathay Pacific Drops Most Since 2008 as Yields Hurt Outlook
item.description: Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. shares tumbled the most in almost 17 years as a sharper-than-expected decline in passenger yields and swelling expenses clouds its growth outlook.

item.title: Cathay Pacific Drops Most Since 2008 as Yields Hurt Outlook
item.description: Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. shares tumbled the most in almost 17 years as a sharper-than-expected decline in passenger yields and swelling expenses clouds its growth outlook.

item.title: Cathay Pacific Slumps Most Since 2008 on Drop in Passenger Yield
item.description: Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. shares tumbled the most since 2008 as a sharper-than-expected decline in yields clouds its growth outlook.

item.title: Cathay Pacific Slumps Most Since 2008 on Drop in Passenger Yield
item.description: Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. shares tumbled the most since 2008 as a sharper-than-expected decline in yields clouds its growth outlook.

item.title: Hong Kong Issues Highest Storm Alert as Typhoon Wipha Moves In
item.description: Hong Kong raised its storm alert to the highest level as tropical cyclone Wipha moved closer, with Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. delaying and canceling flights in and out of the city on Sunday.

item.title: Hong Kong Issues Highest Storm Alert as Typhoon Wipha Moves In
item.description: Hong Kong raised its storm alert to the highest level as tropical cyclone Wipha moved closer, with Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. delaying and canceling flights in and out of the city on Sunday.

item.title: Cathay Pacific Cancels Sunday Flights as Typhoon Nears Hong Kong
item.description: Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. delayed and canceled flights in and out of Hong Kong on Sunday as tropical cyclone Wipha approaches the city.
